Articles.Content: Iirc B9 had them, but B9's not updated for 1.0.4 yet and I'm struggling to find another mod that adds them. Surely there must be one?
I haven't come across any myself but I'll an eye out. Have you tried Welding?

You're correct. B9 Aerospace contains invisible struts.

Welding could be an option but you could also consider Kerbal Joint Reinforcement. With KJR you might not need struts at all.

The last plane I built was still flapping like a bird even with KJR. Maybe I just need to design them better though...

Might even end up downloading B9 and seeing if I can install only the invisible struts, tbh

The last plane I built was still flapping like a bird even with KJR. ...

Another option to reduce 'flapping' wings is TweakScale. Simply by scaling the wing parts to 200% you'll reduce the parts needed to build the same surface by 75%. Less parts/joints means less wobble.
